Class QRBill.QRBillException

  • java.lang.Object

        • com.gfb.test.QRBill.QRBillException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    QRBill

    public class QRBill.QRBillException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception thrown upon validation failure whenever the class is instantiated with raw QR code or QRBill.getQRCode() is called. This exception object contains both an error code (int) and error message (String). The error codes and messages that may be returned are as follows:
    1. Input data empty or null.
    2. Input data exceeds maximum allowed limit.
    3. Malformed Data - insufficient fields.
    4. Version invalid or not supported.
    5. QR Type invalid or not supported.
    6. Valid Coding type Missing.
    7. Valid IBAN Missing.
    8. Valid Currency Missing.
    9. Valid Reference Missing.
    10. Mandatory actor dependencies not met.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
